title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the EmotionalAtmosphereMonitor project, including the types of sensors needed, the emotional states to be monitored, the desired visualization methods, and any specific constraints or regulations to be considered.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the sensor network, data collection and processing pipelines, AI models for emotion detection, and visualization components.

title: Develop Sensor Network
description: Design and implement the network of sensors for collecting data from public spaces or large events.

title: Build Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the data processing pipeline for ingesting, cleaning, and preparing the sensor data for analysis.

title: Develop AI Models for Emotion Detection
description: Research, train, and deploy AI models capable of detecting and classifying emotional states from the collected data.

title: Design and Implement Visualization Components
description: Design and develop the user interface components for visualizing the collective emotional state of people in public spaces or large events.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Emotion Detection

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management solutions for storing and retrieving sensor data, processed data, and visualization data.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop and implement security and privacy measures to protect the collected data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the EmotionalAtmosphereMonitor system.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Emotion Detection
Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the EmotionalAtmosphereMonitor system meets all requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the EmotionalAtmosphereMonitor system, covering installation, configuration, usage, and maintenance.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
